failures.reason: Extraction validation failed: Expected at least 50 products for anthropologie, but only extracted 46. DOM found 72 URLs.
failures.notes: Catalog extraction produced fewer products than expected. The DOM parser found 72 product URLs, but Gemini analysis only validated 46 products, falling short of the 50-product minimum threshold for Anthropologie. This triggered a DOM-first fallback attempt.

notes: This was an earlier catalog monitoring attempt for Anthropologie dresses. The extraction validation detected that too few products were being returned (46 vs expected 50+), with DOM finding 72 URLs. This suggests Gemini was filtering out or failing to process a significant number of products. Enhanced failure tracking was not yet deployed during this run.
action_items: Investigate why Gemini is rejecting/missing ~36% of products found in DOM
Consider adjusting validation thresholds or improving Gemini prompt for Anthropologie
